lead_paragraph: Alarmed at the spread of a Palestinian campaign to boycott Israel, the Israeli Mission to the U.N. and World Jewish Congress look to galvanize support for a countermessage.

headline.print_headline: Israeli Officials Seek Way to Combat Boycott Effort
headline.main: Israeli Officials Seek Ways to Combat Boycott Effort

snippet: Alarmed at the spread of a Palestinian campaign to boycott Israel, the Israeli Mission to the U.N. and World Jewish Congress look to galvanize support for a countermessage.
abstract: Israeli Mission to United Nations and World Jewish Congress holds conference to create counter-message to Palestinian campaign, known as Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions, that is aimed at boycotting Israel and its influence on college campuses.
